title: Plotting with Keywords
description: In this lab, you will learn how to generate plots using strings corresponding to variables using the numpy.recarray or pandas.DataFrame data format with the data keyword argument in Matplotlib.

meta.title: Plotting with Keywords
meta.description: Learn how to generate plots using strings and data formats in Matplotlib.
meta.keywords: python playground, pandas, matplotlib, python, data visualization, data analysis, numpy
